update.description:
Many source files in `src` need to be moved to component `src` folders. Most of them are moved in this pull request, except for some files with problems on windows listed in [src/CMakeLists.txt](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-common/src/5361c388fb6689a87dad99e04f6665e9edbd343c/src/CMakeLists.txt?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#CMakeLists.txt-13:24). I also split the `av` functions out from `src/Util.cc` and moved them to `av/src/Util.cc` (4b36e63). I added just enough temporary cmake code to find these source files and add them to the variable `extra_sources`, which is used in the `ign_add_library` command.

It might help to review each commit:

* 519396b: move events src files (but not tests). Three source files are moved without modification. Some cmake and code_check.sh changes are included too.

* 65c8047: move most graphics src files (but not tests or files with windows problems). 21 source files are moved without modification ([diff stat here](https://gist.github.com/scpeters/f64e14d7187ea6d9072e3777da9a1afd)).

* 4b36e63: move av functions from src/Util.cc to av/src/Util.cc. Just the Util.cc files are modified.

*  2ae604f: added the other src folders to code_check.sh
update.title: Components Part 3: Move many src files to component folders

content.raw: that's what I mean. we have a few things using free image, a few things using gts, and everything else. Should we have an `image` component and a `gts` component (though there is probably a better name than `gts`)?
content.html: that's what I mean. we have a few things using free image, a few things using gts, and everything else. Should we have an image component and a gts component (though there is probably a better name than gts)?

pullrequest.title: Components Part 3: Move many src files to component folders

content.raw: We could break the component down further instead of renaming the whole thing. I think the main question is: How closely are the classes intended to work together? (And also, can we come up with more descriptive component names if we decompose them?)
content.html: We could break the component down further instead of renaming the whole thing. I think the main question is: How closely are the classes intended to work together? (And also, can we come up with more descriptive component names if we decompose them?)
